CHAT.comment: CHAT format needs to be double-checked
screen time is elapsed time from beginning of visit in min:sec

g.ga: short form of C's name Lorena

u.a: M drops a pot on the floor
M picks up pot from floor
M manipulates dishes; making a lot of noise
C touches pan in front of herself she used to cook
C touches pot in front of herself
C reaches across table and picks up a lid
C puts lid on pot; M manipulates dishes
C takes lid off her pot and stirs
M hands C a cup and saucer
C lifts cup and saucer and almost drops it because chair is very far from table
M pushes C's chair closer to table
C still holding cup and saucer
C puts spoon near her cup and saucer
C spoons from pan into cup
M puts a fork near C
M puts a fork near herself
M puts a knife by C
M puts a knife by herself
C mumbles to herself and shrugs her shoulders
M touches something in dishes near C
M touches something in dishes near C

g.ga: pretends to read from book she is holding

u.a: M and C put fingers to their lips
M leans forward to hear more clearly
M picks up another book; C makes her close it
M coughs loudly; hard to hear; C turns page
C indicates M is to read nursery rhyme book
M halfheartedly opens nursery rhyme book; closes it
C points inside book she has opened
C turns page; it takes her a while; C lets out a loud sigh when she finally turns page
